price: Y le mostré el camino [para que libremente elija] ser de los agradecidos o de los ingratos.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
